title: Kirby: The Complete Collection (37 games for 13 platforms)
body:
Kirby: The Complete Collection (37 games for 13 platforms)


Genres/Tags: Arcade, 2D, 3D
Companies: HAL Laboratory, Nintendo
Languages: ENG, up to MULTI9
Original Size: 20.5 GB
Repack Size: 10.2 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors [FIXED repack]

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Updated files only, for original repack

Unpack this rar to original repack installator folder, overwriting old files and then reinstall the collection. Use it only if you have downloaded the 1st repack and had erorrs with it.

7 MB of changed files

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on 37 of ROMs/ISOs/Digital downloads: 20.5 GB total
  • 100% Lossless, but for some games NOT MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation, but the encryption was removed on some files for some platforms for better compression
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Preconfigured portable emulators (mGBA, NO$GBA, Nestopia, BSNES-HD, Project64, Dolphin, DeSmuME, Citra, Cemu, Yuzu, Ryujinx) added
  • Custom launcher is available from desktop icon, allowing you to run any game in one/two clicks
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 20.5 to 10.2 GB)
  • Installation takes 15-25 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 20.5 GB (~29 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game or emulator settings, depending on a game or a platform
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

This collection includes all Kirby games released on all Nintendo platforms since year 1992 up to the latest game. All these games are coupled with corresponding preconfigured portable emulators. As a bonus, all these games can be run via a single launcher for better user experience.

Included games

  1. 1992 – Kirby’s Dream Land (GameBoy)
  2. 1993 – Kirby’s Adventure (NES)
  3. 1993 – Kirby’s Pinball Land (GameBoy)
  4. 1994 – Kirby’s Dream Course (SNES)
  5. 1995 – Kirby’s Avalanche (SNES)
  6. 1995 – Kirby’s Dream Land 2 (GameBoy)
  7. 1995 – Kirby’s Block Ball (GameBoy)
  8. 1996 – Kirby Super Star/Fun Pak (SNES)
  9. 1996 – Kirby’s Toy Box [collection of 8 smaller games] (Satellaview)
  10. 1997 – Kirby’s Star Stacker (GameBoy)
  11. 1997 – Kirby’s Dream Land 3 (SNES)
  12. 1998 – Kirby’s Super Star Stacker (SNES)
  13. 2000 – Kirby 64: The Crystal Shards (N64)
  14. 2000 – Kirby Tilt ‘n’ Tumble (GameBoy Color)
  15. 2002 – Kirby: Nightmare in Dream Land (GBA)
  16. 2003 – Kirby Air Ride (GameCube)
  17. 2003 – Kirby Slide / Kirby Puzzle (GBA/e-Reader)
  18. 2004 – Kirby & The Amazing Mirror (GBA)
  19. 2005 – Kirby: Canvas Curse/Kirby: Power Paintbrush (NDS)
  20. 2006 – Kirby: Squeak Squad/Kirby: Mouse Attack (NDS)
  21. 2008 – Kirby Super Star Ultra (NDS)
  22. 2010 – Kirby’s Epic Yarn (Wii)
  23. 2011 – Kirby Mass Attack (NDS)
  24. 2011 – Kirby’s Return to Dream Land/Kirby’s Adventure Wii (Wii)
  25. 2012 – Kirby’s Dream Collection (Wii)
  26. 2014 – Kirby: Triple Deluxe (3DS)
  27. 2014 – Kirby Fighters Deluxe (3DS)
  28. 2014 – Dedede’s Drum Dash Deluxe (3DS)
  29. 2015 – Kirby and the Rainbow Curse/Paintbrush (WiiU)
  30. 2016 – Kirby: Planet Robobot (3DS)
  31. 2017 – Team Kirby Clash Deluxe (3DS)
  32. 2017 – Kirby’s Blowout Blast (3DS)
  33. 2017 – Kirby Battle Royale (3DS)
  34. 2018 – Kirby Star Allies (Switch)
  35. 2019 – Kirby’s Extra Epic Yarn (3DS)
  36. 2019 – Super Kirby Clash (Switch)
  37. 2020 – Kirby Fighters 2 (Switch)
